attributes.action: Please award the MBE or OBE to 82 year old Tony Foulds of Sheffield
attributes.background: Tony Foulds of Sheffield created and tends a memorial to the 10 USAAF men who died in B-17 Mi Amigo when it crashed in Endcliffe Park, Sheffield on the 22nd February 1944, after returning from a raid, badly damaged. He embodies everything that is good about the UK and deserves to be recognised.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
